en.title: New Year Celebration 02nd February 2008. Wisma MCA, Kuala Lumpur.
en.content:
FE would like to take this opportunity to thank all our Members and Leaders and wish all a very Happy and Successful New Year 2008. To all our new Members and Leaders a BIG welcome and THANK YOU for joining and choosing FE as the MLM company of choice. As a team, we will continue on our path to be a dominant force in the GLOBAL MLM industry. 

FE’s New Year Celebration event on the 02nd February 2008 was a HUGE success, attended by a capacity crowd of 900 Members and Leaders from around the world. (in fact, we had to apologise to the many disappointed Members whom we could not accommodate due to space constraints of the event hall). 

Activities During the Event Include:-

  • Welcome performance by the renowned Ku Seng Keng Lion Dance Troupe (Winner of 22 World Lion Dance Competitions).
  • Performances by artiste Karen Kong and Father of Thai Jazz, Mr. Metawat Sapsanyakorn.
  • Karaoke Singing Competition. (Winner Malek Noor).
  • Presentation of Certificate of Attendance, PGA Merchandise Show, Orlando, USA.
  • Recognition of Directors, Executive Directors and Presidential Directors.
  • Country Licensee Signing Ceremonies, Thailand and Sudan.
  • Launching of FE’s Mobile Credit Card Terminals for Leaders.

Well Known Personalities and Prominent Thais who Attended the Event Include :-

  • Hafiz Hashim (All England Badminton Champion), Foo Kok Keong, Malek Noor, Karen Kong.
  • Supanut Donchan (TV Presenter and Country Licensee, Thailand).
  • Metawat Sapsanyakorn (Father of Thai Jazz).
  • Kovit Wattanakul (Most Decorated Thai Actor and Star of Numerous Hollywood Movies, including Sniper 2).
  • Pramuan Ruchanaseree (Former Deputy Minister of Ministry of Interiors and President Prachamati Party).
  • Police Major General Angkul Athorn Phatai.
  • Col. Manoon Laohachote (Golf Tournament Organizer and Referee).
  • Vichayut Siriyanada (Thai Professional Golfer).
  • Pisut Amnajvoraprasert (TV Presenter).
  • Tanachot Pratoomsawat (TV Presenter).
